name: The Last Outpost (Mini Jam 74)
description:
This is/was a game for Mini Jam 74 I made this with my friend. The object of the game is to keep the enemy's away from you outpost for as long as possible. 

Please use the tutorial the keys are different than most games because of the Jams limitation.

Code By: Liam_x220

Art By: Valholl Studios

https://itch.io/profile/valholl-studios
